entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
